name: SmartRabbi
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Rabbi what is this week's Parasha”
”Alexa, ask Smart Rabbi what is today hebrew date”
”Alexa, ask Smart Rabbi when does shabbat start in New York”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart rabbi
des:
This skill provides detailed information about shabbat hours, Omer's day or Hebrew date. Some answers include hebrew words. The Skill works on all Amazon Echo devices.

What time is shabbat in Jerusalem?
What is tomorrow's hebrew date?
What is today's count of the omer?
What is this week's Parasha?

Just ask Smart Rabbi, on Alexa !
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
